name: King of the Hook
description:
Help the plushies get out of this machine !

Made at the 13th creative jam  at NAD, from 11 to 13 January 

Félix-Antoine Dupéré - Technical artist
Maryse Duckett - Artiste 3D
Camille Côté - Animatrice 3D
Mahély Seyer - Artiste 3D
Kevin Duguay - Programmeur 
Kerby Tineus - Programmeur 
Daniel Sami - Programmeur 
Samuel Hébert - Sound designer
